div.p: Used to specify why the normally expected content of the data element is missing
This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/data-absent-reason

tr.td: The source human does not know the value
There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known
The workflow didn't lead to this value being known
The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons
The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element
The content of the data is represented as text
Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available

description.value: Used to specify why the normally expected content of the data element is missing

definition.value: The source human does not know the value
There is reason to expect (from the workflow) that the value may become known
The workflow didn't lead to this value being known
The information is not available due to security, privacy or related reasons
The source system wasn't capable of supporting this element
The content of the data is represented as text
Some system or workflow process error means that the information is not available
